text:
The couple married in September 2004 and shares three sons

Modern Family star Julie Bowen and her husband, real estate investor Scott Phillips, are going their separate ways.

PEOPLE has confirmed that the couple, who married in September 2004, has separated after 13 years of marriage.

Get push notifications with news, features and more.

They share three sons: Oliver, 10, and twins John and Gustav, 8.

Los Angeles LGBT Center's 47th Anniversary Gala Vanguard Awards - Arrivals Julie Bowen and Scott Phillips in 2016 | Credit: Gabriel Olsen/Getty

They were last photographed with their kids at a Harlem Globetrotters game in Los Angeles almost a year ago, in February 2017, and the pair most recently walked a red carpet together in September 2016 at the Los Angeles LGBT Center 47th Anniversary Gala Vanguard Awards in West Hollywood.

Celebrities at the Harlem Globetrotters game, Los Angeles, USA - 19 Feb 2017 From left: Scott Phillips, Oliver McLanahan Phillips, Gustav Phillips, John Phillips and Julie Bowen | Credit: John Photography/REX/Shutterstock

At that gala, Bowen, 47, explained why Phillips, 44, didn’t attend the Emmy Awards that year.

“We just had our anniversary on the day of the Emmys which was hilarious,” Bowen told PEOPLE. “He’s come every year, he’s been so supportive and this year he was playing in a tennis tournament and I wasn’t nominated as an individual so I said, ‘What do you want to do on our anniversary?’ I mean it’s such an honor to be nominated and to go, but it’s tough to be a purse holder.”
title: Julie Bowen and Husband Scott Phillips Separate
